reviews.review_msg: Overall, I thought Linda was a good prof. She is always available for help and gives detailed answers to the questions you ask. One thing I really liked about her was that she gave people time in class to work on their assignments and ask her questions in case they couldn't come to her office hours. However, I found her to be a bit of a hard marker

Translation course. 1) she is very arbitrary and not open to different correct & possible answers; 2) she has no respect for other teachers and students - letting students out 10 mins late every class is unacceptable; 3) it seems to be against her morals to give anything higher than A-; 4) she is most definitely bias towards suck-ups; 5) oblivious.
